card.name: Forward planning
card.text: You receive 2 bases instead of 1.

card.name: A new rising power
card.text: Special victory : You win if you control at least 3 areas giving conquest points during the third age.

card.name: Glipmse the future
card.text: Place all z-axis. You place an overlord on each route leading to your base.

card.name: Hasten the end
card.text: Draw 4 event cards.

card.name: Sarah Kerrigan
card.text: Place Kerrigan on a friendly zone. Kerrigan always use the major values of combat cards and doesn't have the sacrifice ability.

card.name: Deathblow
card.text: Each time you reveal an order during the next action phase, you can execute a special move order instead. It doesn't count toward your special order limit.

card.name: Subtle influence
card.text: Choose a planet where you have more units than each single player. During the next planning phase, the other players can't place more than 1 order on this planet.

card.name: Endless hunger
card.text: Add 1 gaz and 1 mineral to your base resources.

card.name: The swarm
card.text: Special victory : You win if you have at least 3 bases during the third age.

card.name: The Overmind
card.text: Place an Overmind installation on a friendly zone. As long as the Overmind is in play, you gain one more conquest point per turn.

card.name: Cerebrate Doggath
card.text: Place a Doggath installation on a friendly zone. As long as Doggath is in play, you place one more order during the start of the planning phase.

card.name: Torrasque
card.text: Place a Torrasque ultralisk on a friendly zone. At the end of each regrouping phase, if Torrasque is dead, you can place it back on one of you bases.

card.name: The swarm flies
card.text: Destroy up to one enemy transport on each navigation route.

card.name: Teeming spawn
card.text: Execute a build order on any planet. Afterward, all your workers become available again.

card.name: Emperor Arcturus I
card.text: Choose which planets you receive. You can also choose the first player.

card.name: Terran dominion
card.text: Special victory : You win if you control all the areas on two planets during the third age.

card.name: The sons of Korhal
card.text: You can place a single star order during each planning phase. When you execute a star order, you replace it with any possible special or normal order.

card.name: The Norad II
card.text: Place a Norad battlecruiser on a friendly zone. the Norad has +1 health.

card.name: Tactical mastery
card.text: Choose 2 areas that don't give conquest points. Those areas now give an additional conquest point on top of the other benefits it gave.

card.name: Terran civilization
card.text: Ugrade all you building to the third level for free. Each time you reveal an order during the next action phase, you can execute a special build order instead. It doesn't count toward your special order limit.

card.name: Scorched earth policy
card.text: Place 2 battlecruisers or 2 siege tanks on a friendly zone. All your battlecruisers have the collateral damage ability

card.name: Storage facilities
card.text: Choose resources token of your choice. At start of each regrouping phase, gain up to 3 resource tokens of your choice for each available worker.

card.name: Raynor's raiders
card.text: Special victory : You win if you control at least 6 resources areas during the third age.

card.name: Covert operations
card.text: Place 3 ghosts on your reserve. Any ghost you build can be placed in your reserve. During mobilization on a planet, you can move any ghost from your reseve to this planet as if they were already on the planet

card.name: Jim Raynor
card.text: Place a Jim Raynor vulture on a friendly area. He has +2 health and gives +1 attack to all units in the battle.

card.name: Make do with little
card.text: Each time you build, you can build a worker or transport for free. Each special order module d'ordre spécial and supply depot counts as 2.

card.name: To the bitter end
card.text: All your enemies lose 2 conquest points.

card.name: Psi-disruptor
card.text: Choose a planet where you have at least 1 unit. Every enemy units must leave this planet. They're destroyed if they are unable.

card.name: Orbital platform
card.text: Add 2 minerals to your base resources.

card.name: Domination
card.text: Special victory : You win if you control more areas than each of you enemies during the third age.

card.name: Warp gate
card.text: Place warp gate installation on a friendly area. At the end of each regrouping phase, you may place units from your warp gate to any friendly or empty area.

card.name: Ganthritor
card.text: Place a Ganthritor carrier on a friendly area. Ganthritor has +1 health. When it is destroyed, you may destroy 1 unit, installation or base on the planet.

card.name: Zeratul
card.text: Place a Zeratul dark templar on a friendly area. Zeratul has +1 health and +1 attack. At the start of a battle where Zeratul is involved, the enemy must destroy 1 friendly ground unit.

card.name: Ultimate sacrifice
card.text: Sacrifice a unit and destroy all units in a chosen area from the same planet.

card.name: Return to Aiur
card.text: Place 8 transports on any route. Your transports cannot be destroyed during the next turn.

card.name: Riches of Aiur
card.text: At the end of each regrouping phase, you may restore up to 2 partially exhausted areas.Your areas can't be exhausted by your enemies.

card.name: Predestined
card.text: Special victory : You win if 2 "The end draws near" cards are drawn. Your enemies need 20 conquest points instead of 15 to win.

card.name: Conclave fleet
card.text: Whenever you build a unit, you may place it on reserve. When any mobilize order is revealed, you may move units from your reserve to a friendly area containing one of your bases.

card.name: Fenix
card.text: Place a Fenix dragoon on a friendly area. Fenix can use both high templar and dragoon cards and has +2 health.

card.name: Khala devotee
card.text: At the end of each planning phase, you may choose an order stack. Take the bottom order and place it on top.

card.name: The will of the conclave
card.text: During the next planning phase, you may place 2 orders each time you would place 1. You can't place more than 8 orders.

card.name: Destiny
card.text: No one can win this during this regrouping phase.
